title: New: HÅN – 1986
body:
With her magical debut single lighting up blogs earlier this year, Italian singer/songwriter **HÅN **has returned with her second offering.

 Moving away slightly from the considered, introvert sounds of The Children, to more outwardly pop songwriting, complete with an unashamedly anthemic, Blue Hawaii-esque chorus, _1986_ showcases a bolder, more confident edge to her composition. Check it out below.

Check it out below.
